name: CRYWANKFACE
description:
What

An art experience by @craigtheliar and @joethreepwood

This is a wanking crying and facing simulator.

CONCLUSION: a better game than than Gone Home and a suggested price cheaper than The Witcher 3.

Press Coverage

Rock, Paper, Shotgun: It's basically like Guitar Hero meets that thing where you have to pat your head while rubbing your stomach, but with wanking. And crying.

PC Gamer (issue 257): CRYWANKFACE is far more compulsive than it has any right to be

User Reviews

Erland Grefsrud: I'm watching Shame and it has shades of CRYWANKFACE.

Lee Bradley: I too am a fan of CRYWANKFACE.

Phil Savage: CRYWANKFACE is better than literally some of the games

Ben Barrett: haven't played it, 10/10

Craig Lam: I already have it
